body_html: I should switch to using conda soon, but I'm not yet. Is there a way to point the Torch install to use the libraries from /usr/lib/atlas-base? I'll also try re-compiling OpenBLAS with LAPACK support.
body_text: I should switch to using conda soon, but I'm not yet. Is there a way to point the Torch install to use the libraries from /usr/lib/atlas-base? I'll also try re-compiling OpenBLAS with LAPACK support.
body: I should switch to using `conda` soon, but I'm not yet. Is there a way to point the Torch install to use the libraries from `/usr/lib/atlas-base`? I'll also try re-compiling OpenBLAS with LAPACK support.
